name: Beta Bird
description:
A classic flappy bird spin-off to play while you wait to enter the shop!

How to play:

Tap the screen or click left on your mouse to move the helmet up and down, avoiding obstacles and collecting carabiners! Collect the carabiners to increase your score!

AVOID: Quickdraws

COLLECT: Carabiners

Note: I'm not a game dev pls don't come for me
